messages.text: LGTM. http://codereview.appspot.com/5573048/diff/7004/doc/go1.tmpl File doc/go1.tmpl (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5573048/diff/7004/doc/go1.tmpl#newcode941 doc/go1.tmpl:941: has ben renamed s/ben/been/ http://codereview.appspot.com/5573048/diff/7004/doc/go1.tmpl#newcode992 doc/go1.tmpl:992: ycbcr.YCbCr color.YCbCr s/color/image/ http://codereview.appspot.com/5573048/diff/7004/doc/go1.tmpl#newcode1010 doc/go1.tmpl:1010: take an image.Rectangle as an argument If it matters: 80 chars. http://codereview.appspot.com/5573048/diff/7004/doc/go1.tmpl#newcode1018 doc/go1.tmpl:1018: color.Opaque. This isn't a complete list: there's also color.White and color.Transparent. http://codereview.appspot.com/5573048/diff/7004/doc/go1.tmpl#newcode1022 doc/go1.tmpl:1022: TODO: ycbcr changes need to be added to gofix and to here. Delete.

Hello nigeltao (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

Hello nigeltao@golang.org, christoph@tux21b.org, rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

LGTM. http://codereview.appspot.com/5573048/diff/2003/doc/go1.tmpl File doc/go1.tmpl (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5573048/diff/2003/doc/go1.tmpl#newcode923 doc/go1.tmpl:923: implement "Implement" is not the right word; color.RGBA is not an interface. I would use "are a", with the understanding that "the pixels" mean what's returned by the image's At method, not what the elements of its Pix field are. http://codereview.appspot.com/5573048/diff/2003/doc/go1.tmpl#newcode930 doc/go1.tmpl:930: image.Uniform. Also, image.Tiled was renamed to image.Repeated. (Change here and in the table below). http://codereview.appspot.com/5573048/diff/2003/doc/go1.tmpl#newcode995 doc/go1.tmpl:995: TODO: ycbcr changes need to be added to gofix and to here. There already is a $GOROOT/src/cmd/gofix/imageycbcr.go.

Hello nigeltao@golang.org, christoph@tux21b.org, rsc@golang.org, r@google.com, tux21b@gmail.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5573048/diff/1/doc/go1.tmpl File doc/go1.tmpl (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5573048/diff/1/doc/go1.tmpl#newcode946 doc/go1.tmpl:946: Atob(x) ParseBool(x) This line has nothing to do with the image package, has it?

On Jan 23, 2012, at 1:54 PM, rsc@golang.org wrote:

> The Pixel field in the images changed from []specificColor to []byte,
> and the addressing changed too, I believe (maybe that was r60?).

that's in r60 according to golang.org

-rob

*** Submitted as f6002b0fbe36 ***

doc/go1: image changes

R=nigeltao, christoph, rsc, r, tux21b
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5573048

The Pixel field in the images changed from []specificColor to []byte, and the addressing changed too, I believe (maybe that was r60?). http://codereview.appspot.com/5573048/diff/1/doc/go1.html File doc/go1.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5573048/diff/1/doc/go1.html#newcode1018 doc/go1.html:1018: image.RGBA the pixels in an image.RGBA implement color.RGBA. http://codereview.appspot.com/5573048/diff/1/doc/go1.html#newcode1043 doc/go1.html:1043: Atob(x) ParseBool(x) ?

The change of New(width, height) to New(rect Rectangle) is also new. It is 
in the latest weekly, but not in the release i think.

On 24 January 2012 08:54,  <rsc@golang.org> wrote:
> The Pixel field in the images changed from []specificColor to []byte,
> and the addressing changed too, I believe (maybe that was r60?).

That changed in weekly.2011-07-19, which was before release.r60 (cut
in September).
